titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on Oxirane, 2,2'-[(3,3',5,5'-tetramethyl[1,1'-biphenyl]-4,4'-diyl)bis(oxymethylene)bis- (9Cl).

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 6/6/2006--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on Oxirane, 2,2'-[(3,3',5,5'-tetramethyl[1,1'-biphenyl]-4,4'-diyl)bis(oxymethylene)bis- (9Cl).
